channel.title: Dragon Dagger Double Hit - anyone make this work?
channel.description:
I think I have a vague idea of where to put it, I'm just not able to make it hit twice. Can anyone help me on this?
I just need it to hit then follow up with another hit just after, it doesn't need to be a special attack.
